Word.Root: To restrain, detain, give little, stop hand, be niggardly.

Meaning.Definition: كَدَى aor. يَكْدِىْ inf. noun كَدْيًا كَدَى الرَّجُلَ : He prevented the man or hindered him or kept him busy. اَكْدَى الرَّجُلُ : The man did not succeed in getting what he wanted; he was niggardly in giving; he became poor after he was rich. اَكْدَاهُ عَنْ كَذَا : He turned him away and prevented him. اَكْدَى الْمَعْدِ نُ : The mine refused to yield its minerals.
Meaning.Example: Token(53:35:1:3) : He gave little and that too grudgingly (53:35).
